TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationCanceledException extends System.Exception
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationCanceledException extends System.SystemException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit OperationCanceledException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 当线程取消一个正在执行的操作时在线程中引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown in a thread upon cancellation of an operation that the thread was executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已取消的任务具有关联的取消标记，则该任务将由 属性返回，并且令牌的 属性设置为 `true`。If the task that was canceled had an associated cancellation token, it is returned by the property, and the property of the token is set to `true`.

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用系统提供的错误信息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息，如 "该操作已取消"。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The operation was canceled." 此消息会考虑当前系统区域性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||Nullreferernce （`Nothing` Visual Basic）。A nullreference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.| ||在非取消状态中创建的取消标记。A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.|

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: A that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 的内容设计为易于理解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ||在非取消状态中创建的取消标记。A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.|

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

param.name: token
param.span: 与已取消的操作关联的取消标记。

span.span: A cancellation token associated with the operation that was canceled.

summary.span: 用取消令牌初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a cancellation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息，如 "该操作已取消"。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The operation was canceled." 此消息会考虑当前系统区域性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||Nullreferernce （`Nothing` Visual Basic）。A nullreference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.| ||`token` 列中的一个值匹配。`token`.|

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 包含序列化对象数据的对象。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 与源或目标有关的上下文信息。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间调用此构造函数以重新构造在流上传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization)For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization)

related.span: XML 和 SOAP 序列化

span.span: XML and SOAP Serialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 用于解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 参数不为 ，则当前异常将在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 的内容设计为易于理解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 作为前一个异常的直接结果引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性类型Property Type|条件Condition| |-------------------|---------------| ||`innerException` 列中的一个值匹配。`innerException`.| ||`message` 列中的一个值匹配。`message`.| ||在非取消状态中创建的取消标记。A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.|

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息、对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用以及取消标记来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception, and a cancellation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 的内容设计为易于理解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 作为前一个异常的直接结果引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性类型Property Type|条件Condition| |-------------------|---------------| ||`innerException` 列中的一个值匹配。`innerException`.| ||`message` 列中的一个值匹配。`message`.| ||`token` 列中的一个值匹配。`token`.|

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CancellationToken As CancellationToken
public: property System::Threading::CancellationToken CancellationToken { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

summary.span: 获取与已取消的操作关联的令牌。

span.span: Gets a token associated with the operation that was canceled.

value.span: 与已取消的操作关联的令牌，或默认令牌。

span.span: A token associated with the operation that was canceled, or a default token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标记与已取消的操作相关联，则令牌的 属性将返回 `true`。If the token is associated with a canceled operation, the property of the token returns `true`.
